media.caption: We were on top of Pikes Peak, Colorado

text.headline:
Trisha and Tuhin 6th Anniversary
2015 -
text.text:
Wow, this is amazing, where did the six year go?
Trisha always says I forget things, well, this is a journal that I intend to keep with stories. This is my attempt to remind ourselves how wonderful we have been together, and why we should continue to be this way. Oh, I forgot to mention we have a new member in our family, and with all the parenting woes, I would say we are blessed.
